Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I am not very interested in music, but
today's performance was superb.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Listening to good music and enjoying
some tea...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Today was quite nice, I think.
I feel like I can sleep well tonight.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you interested in music, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
If you are interested in music,
you may enjoy the opera company from
the town where I used to live.
<PAGE>
When you go to an opera show,
you can also see singing and dancing 
performances in addition to music.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>...Would you like to go on a date?
Well, it's pretty far away
so it will take us an entire day.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today's Music Festival was entertaining.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But my princess left me alone
during tea time to talk to other guys...
I was a little jealous.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I suppose It's important to stay on good
terms with the townsfolk, though. You
can't stay with me all the time...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But next year, spend a bit 
more time with me. All right, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That was a nice performance. It made me 
want to learn how to play an instrument.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Hey, <MYNAME>, 
want to take music lessons together?
<PAGE>
When we get better, let's have a family
recital. It would be entertaining.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was able to have a relaxing time 
thanks to the Music Festival today.
I feel like I can sleep well tonight.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Well, even without the Music
Festival, I have a good huggable
pillow named <MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
So I always have a 
good night's sleep.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Music really has the power 
to encourage people and 
make them relax.
<PAGE>
Some of the beauty salons in cities
play music to have their clients
feel relaxed...
<PAGE>
Our store should perhaps follow
this example from now on.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I wonder how musicians' fingers
can move so nimbly.
<PAGE>
Even without hearing singing, I can
enjoy just looking at fingers that move
around on keys or between strings.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That was an amazing performance!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>...What? I was falling asleep?
N-Nuh-uh! I was really listening!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The Music Festival was fun!
Good performances, delicious tea...
It was great!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I listen to music,
it makes me sleepy 
just a little bit...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But today, you were right beside
me, so I was excited and didn't feel
sleepy at all.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But I couldn't pay attention
to the music because of you...

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today's Music Festival was excellent!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But during tea time,
I felt lonely because you kept 
talking to other people.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Next time, I'd be happier
if you talked with me more!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a good performance!
It made me want to learn how to
play a musical instrument!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I have an idea! <MYNAME>, Why
don't we take a music class together?
<PAGE>
Then, when we can play well, we can
hold a family musical recital!
Doesn't that sound fun?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I feel very relaxed thanks to
the Music Festival today, so
I feel like I can sleep well tonight.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But even without
the Music Festival, I have
you...
<PAGE>
That's just relaxing enough for me,
so I usually have a good night's
sleep every night!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I know I shouldn't be falling asleep,
but the music is very comforting
and I couldn't help myself...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>It's not that I'm
not interested in music.
<PAGE>
It's probably because the music is
truly good, so it makes people
feel relaxed and fall asleep!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The people who were performing must be
able to read those papers filled with
tadpoles, right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Wow, that's amazing!
I dunno how anyone could do that!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That was some splendid performance!
I wonder what songs they will
play next year.
<PAGE>
I am looking forward to it.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good music is of course enjoyable,
but it is also nice to talk over a
good cup of tea.
<PAGE>
This type of event gives us an
opportunity to talk to people who we
usually don't have a chance to talk to.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The musical performance by the women is
very nice and gorgeous. It is pleasing
to the eyes as well as to the ears.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But the person who
is truly pleasing to me is of
course you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I feel very comforted when
we spending time together.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today's Music Festival was nice.
<PAGE>
But during the tea time,
You kept talking to other
people...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>So I felt a tad bit lonely.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Next time, it would be
nice if you paid more attention
to your own boyfriend.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That was a good performance.
I feel like playing an instrument now.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I've got an idea, <MYNAME>! Let's
learn a musical instrument together!
<PAGE>
When we can play it well, it would be
nice to hold a family music
recital.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I feel very relaxed thanks to
the Music Festival today, so
I feel like I can sleep well tonight.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But even without
the Music Festival, I always
have you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
That's relaxing enough for me,
so I usually have a good
sleep every night.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Listening to good music
naturally makes you smile.
<PAGE>
Everyone at the festival today
had a happy expression on their face.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Some of them even seemed
enchanted by the music!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That was sound with depth...
That person is an excellent musician.
<PAGE>
What? How do I know that?
Well, I have some experience with
listening to music.
<PAGE>
But I only specializing in listening
to music. I don't play anything at all.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It was a wonderful performance.
I was captivated by the beautiful music.
<PAGE>
The musicians must have spent a 
lot of time practicing.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It was a nice performance.
They say that music enriches one's soul,
and I feel that saying is very true.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It was a great performance. I can
play some musical instruments, but
I can't make sound with such depth.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>...What?
You'd like to hear me play?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I am not that good,
 but if you insist...
<PAGE>
It would be an honor to play 
for you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today's Music Festival
was very excellent, wasn't it?
<PAGE>
But during tea time, you kept
talking to other people, so
I felt a little lonely.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I would appreciate
it if you would pay just a little more
attention to me next time.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That was a good performance, wasn't it?
It made me feel like playing my 
musical instruments again.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH><MYNAME>, why
don't you take this opportunity to learn
a musical instrument?
<PAGE>
When you can play well, we can 
hold a family music recital.
I think that would be fun.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks to the Music Festival, I
feel very relaxed. I think I can
sleep well tonight.
<PAGE>
<PAGE_ROUGH>But even without the
Music Festival, you always stay
beside me...
<PAGE>
That in itself is relaxing enough,
and I am able to have a good 
night's sleep every night.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can play some musical instruments...
But I cannot perform like
they did at all.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I wonder how much
practice was necessary to 
achieve that level of skill...

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The music was wonderful, and
so was the tea was served.
<PAGE>
I wonder where the tea leaves
came from. I will ask 
Dunhill later.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't know much about that kind
of music... Well, I guess it was
a good performance.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Listing to others play music
made me want to play my
instrument again.
<PAGE>
What? Can I play an instrument?
Well, not that great, but I can 
play the guitar ok.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That was a good performance.
I may play the guitar for first time 
in a while when I go home.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>...What?
You want to hear me play?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I'm not that good, but
If it's okay with you, I'll play
for you any time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But don't tell me you're
disappointed afterwards.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today's Music Festival 
was pretty good.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But during tea time,
you kept talking to other people,
so I was bored.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>What? No, I'm not saying I was lonely!
It's just that you are the only one who
is kind to me in this town...
<PAGE>
I was bored because I had no one
else to talk to...
That's all!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That was a good performance.
It made me feel like playing my 
musical instrument again.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH><MYNAME>, why don't you
take this opportunity to learn
a musical instrument?
<PAGE>
When you get better at it, we can 
hold a family music recital. I think
that would be pretty fun.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks to the Music Festival, I
feel very relaxed. I think I can
sleep well tonight.
<PAGE>
<PAGE_ROUGH>But even without the
Music Festival, I have a good
body pillow next to me...
<PAGE>
So I'm always relaxed and have a
good night's sleep every night.
<PAGE>
...Why are you upset?
I'm just kidding. I don't think of
you as a body pillow.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It must be satisfying for a musician
to be able to play in a venue like that.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I feel like standing on
the stage and playing guitar.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Music Festivals are all right,
but I have no interest in
drinking tea.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I have no interest in
tea or sweets at all.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That was a splendid performance...
I feel like listening to it some more.
<PAGE>
If possible, I want them to
play one more song.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The music was wonderful, but
the tea time was nice as well.
<PAGE>
I enjoy the opportunity to socialize...
<PAGE>
I can deepen relationships with
people that I don't normally
converse with.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a great performance it was! I
can play musical instruments, but I
can't make sound with depth like that.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>...What?
You'd like to hear me play?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But I'm not skilled enough
to play for others... However, if you
still want to listen...
<PAGE>
I will gladly play
for you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Today's Music Festival was wonderful.
<PAGE>
But during tea time, you kept talking
to other people, so I felt a little
jealous.
<PAGE>
If possible, pay more attention to me
next time. That would make me happy.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a good performance that was. It
made me feel like playing my instrument 
for the first time in a long time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I've got an idea.
<MYNAME>, why don't you learn to
play an instrument?
<PAGE>
Once you get better at it, we
can hold a family recital.  I am sure
it will be entertaining.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I feel very relaxed thanks to the
Music Festival today, so I feel
like I can sleep well tonight.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But thanks to you...
<PAGE>
I usually have a good night's sleep
every night, even without the
Music Festival.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I have learned to play most
common instruments since 
I was young.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I may not be as skilled as
those ladies, but if possible, I 
would like to play with them some day.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I had an opportunity to talk with
Dunhill at an earlier tea time...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Many of the songs
chosen for the Music Festival seem 
to be by Dunhill's requests.
<PAGE>
There are a few songs that have
special meaning to him, and
that's why they are performed.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That was very nice music!
Now I feel like I want to
do more things!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The music was good of course, but
the sweets and tea afterwards
were the best! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I listen to music when I am
tired, sometimes it makes me
sleepy just a little bit...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But I didn't feel sleepy
at all today, because you were next
to me!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today's Music Festival
was super great, wasn't it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But during tea time, 
you kept talking to other
people, so I felt a little lonely...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>If there's another
opportunity like this, I'd be happy if
you talked with me a lot, too!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That was such a great performance!
It made me want to play a
musical instrument!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>You know what, <MYNAME>? Why 
don't we learn an instrument together?
<PAGE>
And when we get better at it, we
can hold a family music recital!
I bet that will be super fun!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I feel very relaxed today thanks
to the Music Festival, so I feel
like I will sleep well tonight.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But because of you...
<PAGE>
...I usually have a good night's sleep
every night anyway!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I was little, I asked my
parents to let me take music
lessons...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>But they refused,
saying that I was not patient!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>They approved of my
curiosity but...they have a reason
to say so.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But after listening
to today's performance, I wished I 
could have taken music lessons!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It is a pity because no matter how 
great the music is, you can't record 
them as photographs...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But I plan to write about
expression and the hand movements of the
performers in articles for the record!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>If you rely on photos,
you can't become a good reporter.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I want to become a
reporter who can touch people's hearts
with just an article without photos.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It was such nice music.
I am impressed that they can
play such great music.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The music was fabulous, but so was
the tea time!
<PAGE>
The tea and sweets were very tasty,
and I could gather information by
talking to many people.
<PAGE>
I learned rumors about the town
that I didn't know before...
It was fun! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I listen to music when I
am tired, sometimes I get
I little sleepy...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But you were  beside me
today, so my heart was pounding,
and I wasn't sleepy! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today's Music Festival was very nice,
wasn't it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But during tea time you kept
talking to other people, and that
made me feel a little lonely...
<PAGE>
It's important to socialize with others,
but I'll cheat on you if you don't
pay attention to me!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Just kidding! Tee-hee!<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That was a nice performance.
It made me want to learn how
to play a musical instrument ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Hey, <MYNAME>, 
want to take music lessons together?
<PAGE>
When we get better at it, we can
hold a family music recital.  I bet
that would be lots of fun!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I was able to have a relaxing time 
thanks to the Music Festival today.
I feel like I can sleep well tonight.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Well, even without
the Music Festival, I have a good huggy
pillow named <MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
So usually I have a 
good night's sleep anyways ♪

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That was a very nice performance. With
such a high level of skill, I wonder if 
they can play other songs as easily.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>If so, I would like them 
to play some music next time I have
my magic show.
<PAGE>
I think audience will be pleased to 
see a magic show with wonderful
music in the background ♪

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's fun to participate in a festival
because you may see townspeople you
normally don't see.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>The way they were playing music
so seriously at today's Music Fest
is something you don't usually see...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
During the performance...
I felt my eyelids were getting heavier.
And when I noticed, it was over...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I feel my head is clear...I wonder
if this this the power of music...
Music is powerful...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The sweets...were very delicious...
It was a Music Festival...but 
not much music was going on...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>What...? There were...?
...What did I miss...?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I listen to music...sometimes,
I get sleepy...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But today, <MYNAME>
was by me so I felt excite and...didn't
get sleepy at all...
<PAGE>
But my heart was pounding too loud...
so I could not listen to the music
at all anyways...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today's Music Festival was really nice.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But...during tea time, you
kept talking to other people...
That made me feel a little lonely...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Next tea time, it would be
nice if you would talk to me
a little more...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Great performance...Now I feel like 
learning a musical instrument...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH><MYNAME>...do you
want to take music lessons together?
<PAGE>
When we get better...we can hold
a family music recital...and 
I bet that will be fun...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I feel very relaxed thanks to...
the Music Festival today so...
I feel like I can sleep well tonight...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But...even without
the Music Festival, with <MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
I am already relaxed and
having a good night's sleep...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I was little...my mother
taught me to play various
musical instruments...
<PAGE>
But I ended up falling asleep while
playing them...so she said I wasn't
good at them and I quit...
<PAGE>
If I hadn't given up and continued...
I wonder if I would have been able to
play music like that....

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Different instruments, different sounds.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>When the sounds of
two instruments combine, such beautiful
harmony is created...

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The performance by Emma and her 
company has the power to capture the 
audience. It was a great performance.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I would love the opportunity
to perform with Emma and her company.
<PAGE>
It is hard to imagine how my Japanese  
harp may go with the piano and the
violin...
<PAGE>
But I think we'll be able to create a
nice harmony together.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Usually, when I am into music,
I cannot pay any attention
to my surroundings...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But with you by my side,
my attention is on you instead
of on music...
<PAGE>
I... I need to focus... I need to focus,
and make sure to have a calm mind
at any moment.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today's Music Festival was very
enjoyable, wasn't it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But during tea time, you
kept talking to others people, and
I felt a little lonely.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>No... It's just a joke.
Please do not mind. It is important
to socialize with the townspeople.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It was a very nice performance.
Now I feel like playing my 
instrument once again.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Ah, <MYNAME>.
Would you like to learn how to play
an instrument, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
When you get better at it, maybe
we can perform on the stage of 
the Music Festival as a family.
<PAGE>
Giggle...if it becomes true,
it will really be wonderful.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I feel very relaxed thanks to the
Music Festival today. I feel like
I'll sleep well tonight.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But thanks to you...
<PAGE>
...I usually have a good night's sleep
anyway, even without the
Music Festival.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A musical player and instrument are one.
Looking at the instrument, you can tell
how the musician has been treating it.
<PAGE>
By glancing at Emma and her company's
instruments, I can tell they are very
well cared for.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>They must have practiced
a lot and spent a lot of time with their
instruments.
<PAGE>
The instruments must be happy to be
cherished so much.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Music is really nice, sometimes it gives
energy to the person who listens...
sometimes it gives comfort...
<PAGE>
It's one of the most important endeavors
that can't be separated from mankind.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How was my performance?
<PAGE>
Though I play a musical instrument, 
I am just an amateur compared to
professional musicians...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But I would be happy if 
my music could reach your heart.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I felt nervous to play music
on an occasion like this...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Well...
Even more so when I know that...
you are listening...

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I felt very nervous to play music
at a place like this...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>When I saw <MYNAME>
from the stage, my nervousness 
just went away.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>If you think my performance
went well today...that's probably
because of you.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It was a nice music performance.
I have a high respect for people
who can play musical instruments!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I was really into the music...
It looks like my body started moving
to the music without me noticing.
<PAGE>
I feel a little embarrassed...

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Listening to music when I'm tired
sometimes makes me a little bit
sleepy.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But today, you were right beside
me, so my heart kept pounding, and I
didn't feel sleepy at all.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today's Music Festival was really nice,
wasn't it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But during tea time,
you kept talking to other people,
so I felt a little bit lonely...
<PAGE>
I'm jealous! I want to talk to
you more...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>So, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
Next time we go on a date, let's
talk a lot to compensate for 
today! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It was a nice music performance!
Now I feel like learning to play
a musical instrument ♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH><MYNAME>, do you
feel like taking music lessons with me?
<PAGE>
Once you get better at it, we
can hold a family recital.  I think 
it would be just wonderful!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I feel very relaxed today thanks
to the Music Festival, so I feel
like I will sleep well tonight!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But even without the
Music Festival, you're beside
me...
<PAGE>
That's why I usually have a
